verses.verse: Let <S%G5360>brotherly<s%> <S%G5360>love<s%> <S%G3306>continue.<s%>

Be not <S%G1950>forgetful<s%> to <S%G5381>entertain<s%> <S%G5381>strangers:<s%> for <S%G1223>thereby<s%> <S%G5026><s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> have <S%G3579>entertained<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G2990>unawares.<s%>

<S%G3403>Remember<s%> them that are in <S%G1198>bonds,<s%> as <S%G4887>bound<s%> with them; and them which <S%G2558>suffer<s%> <S%G2558>adversity,<s%> as <S%G5607>being<s%> <S%G846>yourselves<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> in the <S%G4983>body.<s%>

<S%G1062>Marriage<s%> is <S%G5093>honorable<s%> in <S%G3956>all,<s%> and the <S%G2845>bed<s%> <S%G283>undefiled:<s%> but <S%G4205>fornicators<s%> and <S%G3432>adulterers<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> will <S%G2919>judge.<s%>

Let <S%G3588>your<s%> <S%G5158>conversation<s%> be <S%G866>without<s%> <S%G866>covetousness;<s%> and be <S%G714>content<s%> with <S%G3588>such<s%> things as you <S%G3918>have:<s%> for he has <S%G2046>said,<s%> I will <S%G3364>never<s%> <S%G447>leave<s%> you, <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G3364><s%> <S%G1459>forsake<s%> you.
<S%G5620>So<s%> that we may <S%G2292>boldly<s%> <S%G3004>say,<s%> The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is my <S%G998>helper,<s%> and I will not <S%G5399>fear<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> shall do to me.

<S%G3421>Remember<s%> them which <S%G3918>have<s%> the <S%G2233>rule<s%> over you, <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G3918>have<s%> <S%G2980>spoken<s%> to you the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God:<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G3401>follow,<s%> <S%G333>considering<s%> the <S%G1545>end<s%> of their <S%G391>conversation.<s%>
<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G5504>yesterday,<s%> and to <S%G4594>day,<s%> and for <S%G165>ever.<s%>

Be not <S%G4064>carried<s%> <S%G4064>about<s%> with <S%G4164>divers<s%> and <S%G3581>strange<s%> <S%G1322>doctrines.<s%> For it is a <S%G2570>good<s%> thing that the <S%G2588>heart<s%> be <S%G950>established<s%> with <S%G5485>grace;<s%> not with <S%G1033>meats,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3918>have<s%> not <S%G5623>profited<s%> them that <S%G3918>have<s%> been <S%G4043>occupied<s%> <S%G1722>therein<s%> <S%G3639><s%>.

We <S%G2192>have<s%> an <S%G2379>altar,<s%> <S%G1537>whereof<s%> <S%G3739><s%> they <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1849>right<s%> to <S%G5315>eat<s%> which <S%G3000>serve<s%> the <S%G4633>tabernacle.<s%>

For the <S%G4983>bodies<s%> of <S%G5130>those<s%> <S%G2226>beasts,<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> is <S%G1533>brought<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G39>sanctuary<s%> by the <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest<s%> for <S%G266>sin,<s%> are <S%G2618>burned<s%> <S%G1854>without<s%> the <S%G3925>camp.<s%>

<S%G1352>Why<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> that he might <S%G37>sanctify<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> with his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G129>blood,<s%> <S%G3958>suffered<s%> <S%G1854>without<s%> the <S%G4439>gate.<s%>
Let us <S%G1831>go<s%> <S%G1831>forth<s%> <S%G5106>therefore<s%> to him <S%G1854>without<s%> the <S%G3925>camp,<s%> <S%G5342>bearing<s%> his <S%G3680>reproach.<s%>
For <S%G5602>here<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> we <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3306>continuing<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> but we <S%G1934>seek<s%> one to <S%G3195>come.<s%>

By him <S%G3767>therefore<s%> let us <S%G399>offer<s%> the <S%G2378>sacrifice<s%> of <S%G133>praise<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1275>continually,<s%> that is, the <S%G2590>fruit<s%> of our <S%G5491>lips<s%> giving <S%G3670>thanks<s%> to his <S%G3686>name.<s%>

But to <S%G2140>do<s%> <S%G2140>good<s%> and to <S%G2842>communicate<s%> <S%G1950>forget<s%> not: for with <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifices<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G2100>well<s%> <S%G2100>pleased.<s%>

<S%G3982>Obey<s%> them that have the <S%G2233>rule<s%> over you, and <S%G5226>submit<s%> <S%G5216>yourselves:<s%> for they <S%G69>watch<s%> for <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5590>souls,<s%> as they that must <S%G591>give<s%> <S%G3056>account,<s%> that they may <S%G4160>do<s%> it with <S%G5479>joy,<s%> and not with <S%G4727>grief:<s%> for that is <S%G255>unprofitable<s%> for you.

<S%G4336>Pray<s%> for us: for we <S%G3982>trust<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G4893>conscience,<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> things <S%G2309>willing<s%> to <S%G390>live<s%> <S%G2573>honestly.<s%>
But I <S%G3870>beseech<s%> you the <S%G4056>rather<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G5124>this,<s%> that I may be <S%G600>restored<s%> to you the <S%G5032>sooner.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G1515>peace,<s%> that <S%G321>brought<s%> <S%G321>again<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead<s%> our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> that <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4166>shepherd<s%> of the <S%G4263>sheep,<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of the <S%G166>everlasting<s%> <S%G1242>covenant,<s%>

<S%G2675>Make<s%> you <S%G2675>perfect<s%> in <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> his <S%G2307>will,<s%> <S%G4160>working<s%> in you that which is well <S%G2101>pleasing<s%> in his <S%G1799>sight,<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ;<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> be <S%G1391>glory<s%> for <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>

And I <S%G3870>beseech<s%> you, <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G430>suffer<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G3874>exhortation:<s%> for I have <S%G1989>written<s%> a <S%G1989>letter<s%> to you in <S%G1024>few<s%> words.

<S%G1097>Know<s%> you that our <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G5095>Timothy<s%> is <S%G630>set<s%> <S%G630>at<s%> <S%G630>liberty;<s%> with <S%G3739>whom,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> he <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G5032>shortly,<s%> I will <S%G3700>see<s%> you.
<S%G782>Salute<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> them that have the <S%G2233>rule<s%> over you, and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G40>saints.<s%> They of <S%G2482>Italy<s%> <S%G782>salute<s%> you.
<S%G5485>Grace<s%> be with you <S%G3956>all.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%> Written to the Hebrews from Italy, by Timothy.
